about club: Maaya is the annual intercollegiate techno-cultural fest of PES University, Electronic City Campus. The fest has a wide display of celebrity performances, concerts and plenty of events for everyone with great prizes. Maaya is ranked among the top 10 fest in Bangalore with 50 colleges participating and a footfall of over 9000 people last year. We have over 32 events with various categories such as cultural, technical, sports and theatre, to name a few. [cite: 6, 7, 8, 9]

It aims to bring together students from various colleges, enhancing intercollegiate interactions and delivering high-quality entertainment and competitive experiences. [cite: 15, 16]

about club: MUNSOC is dedicated to the simulation of real-world United Nations conferences, where students engage in research, debate, and diplomacy to address global issues and draft resolutions. [cite: 246, 247, 248]
recruitment procedure: During the MUNSOC recruitment drive, application forms will be released for interested candidates. goal of club: The goal of MUNSOC is to create a platform for students to develop their skills in diplomacy, leadership, and problem-solving. [cite: 254]

about club: We, the members of Rotaract Club, PES University , Electronic City Campus, are looking forward to working on initiatives to serve the underprivileged children & youth of the society. about club: ನಮ್ಮ ಯುವ ಪೀಳಿಗೆಯಮ್ನಸ್ಸಿ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಕನನ ಡ ಅಭಿಮಾನಹಾಗೂ ಕರ್ನಾಟಕದ ಸಂಸಕ ೃತಿ,ಇತಿಹಾಸ,ಪರಂಪರೆಯಬಗೆೆ ಅರಿವು ಮೂಡಿಸುವ ಮ್ತ್ತು ಕನನ ಡಭಾಷೆಯನ್ನನ ಉಳಿಸ್ಸ-ಬೆಳೆಸುವ ಜವಬ್ದಾ ರಿಯನ್ನನ ಮ್ನಸಿ ಲ್ಲಿ ಟ್ಟು ಕಂಡುನಮ್ಮ ಪ.ಇ.ಎಸ್ ವಿಶ್ವ ವಿದ್ಯಾ ನಿಲಯದಲ್ಲಿ ೧೯-೦೯-೨೦೨೨ ರಲ್ಲಿ ಕಾಯ-ವಾಚ ಮ್ನಸ್ಸಿ ನಿಂದ ಕನನ ಡಕೂಟವನ್ನನ ಸ್ಥಾ ಪಸಲಾಯಿತ್ತ. ಈಕೂಟವು ವಿಶ್ವ ವಿದ್ಯಾ ಲಯದ ಆಡಳಿತ ಮ್ಂಡಳಿ, ಪ್ರ ಂಶುಪ್ಲರುಹಾಗೂ ಬೀಧಕ ಸ್ಸಬಬ ಂದಿಗಳ ಸಹಕಾರದಂದಿಗೆ, ಪರ ತಿ ವರ್ಾವೂ ವಿದ್ಯಾ ರ್ಥಾಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಸಪ ರ್ಧಾತಮ ಕ ಮ್ನೀಭಾವನೆಹಾಗೂಕನನ ಡ ರ್ನಡಿನಭಾಷೆ,ಸ್ಥಹಿತಾ,ಸಂಸಕ ರತಿ,ಕಲೆಯನ್ನನ ಬೆಳೆಸುವ ಉದ್ಾ ೀಶ್ದಿಂದ ಸ್ಥಂಸಕ ೃತಿಕ ಕಾಯಾಕರ ಮ್,ರಸಪರ ಶ್ನನ ಕಾಯಾಕರ ಮ್,ಹಾಾ ಕಥಾನಂತಹ ತಂತಿರ ಕ ಕಾಯಾಕರ ಮ್ಗಳನ್ನನ ಏಪಾಡಿಸುವಮೂಲಕ ವಿದ್ಯಾ ರ್ಥಾಗಳ ಪರ ತಿಭೆಗೆ ವೀದಿಕೆಯನ್ನನ ಕಲ್ಲಪ ಸಲಾಗುತು ದ್. ಇದಲಿ ದ್ ಕರ್ನಾಟಕ ರಾಜ್ಾ ೀತಿ ವವನ್ನನ ಕನನ ಡ ಹಬಬ ದ ರಿೀತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಆಚರಿಸಲಾಗುವುದು,ಇದರಿಂದ ವಿದ್ಯಾ ರ್ಥಾಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಕನನ ಡದ ಮೀಲೆ ಸ್ಥವ ಭಿಮಾನ ಹೆಚ್ಚಾ ಗಿ ಬೆಳೆಯಲು ಸಹಾಯವಾಗವುದು.ಈಕೂಟವು ಕನನ ಡರ್ನಡುನ್ನಡಿಯಬಗೆೆ ವಿರ್ಯವನ್ನನ ಪಸರಿಸುವ ನಿಷ್ಟು ವಂತಹಾಗೂಉತಿ ಹಭರಿತ ಸದಸಾ ರನ್ನನಹಂದಿದ್ಹಾಗೂಕಾಯಾಕ್ಷಮ್ತೆಯುಳಳ ಹಸ ಮುಖಗಳನ್ನನ ಸಹ ಪರ ತಿವರ್ಾವು ಸೀರಿಸ್ಸಕಳಳ ಲಾಗುವುದು. [cite: 283, 284, 285]
recruitment procedure: During the Kannada Koota recruitment drive, interested candidates can apply by filling out an application form. The selection process may include an interaction round to assess enthusiasm for Kannada language and culture, along with a brief discussion on literature, history, or cultural topics. The final selection list will be announced via email. [cite: 286, 288, 289]
recruitment time: The recruitment for Kannada Koota takes place at the beginning of each academic year. [cite: 290]
goal of club: The goal of Kannada Koota is to preserve and promote the Kannada language, literature, and cultural heritage among students. The club provides a platform for individuals passionate about Karnataka’s traditions to engage in cultural, literary, and technical events, fostering a deeper connection to their roots. By organizing festivals, competitions, and awareness programs, Kannada Koota aims to instill pride in Kannada and encourage active participation in keeping its legacy alive. [cite: 291, 292, 293]
